mapper.select: SELECT seq, id, content, bbs_seq bbsSeq, created_at createdAt, del FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS rnum, seq, id, content, bbs_seq, created_at, del FROM comment WHERE bbs_seq=#{bbsSeq}) a WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${pageStart} AND ${pageEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (id, content, bbs_seq, created_at, del) VALUES (#{id}, #{content}, #{bbsSeq}, NOW(), 0)
